languages.text: "Что? Нет! Да какие нестыковки... я один из всего отряда выжил, понимаете? Все мои друзья мертвы — вот, лежат! А я пошел вас предупредить, не сбежал, не спрятался... а вы..."

"What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."
languages.original_text: "Что? Нет! Да какие нестыковки... я один из всего отряда выжил, понимаете? Все мои друзья мертвы — вот, лежат! А я пошел вас предупредить, не сбежал, не спрятался... а вы..."

traits.locale_text: "What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my whole squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! And I've gone on to warn you, instead of running, instead of hiding... and you..."

"What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my whole squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! And I've gone on to warn you, instead of running, instead of hiding... and you..."

"What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I've chosen to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

"What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I've chosen to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

"What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

"What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

languages.text: "Was? Nein! Was für Ungereimtheiten? Ich bin der einzige Überlebende meines ganzen Trupps, versteht Ihr? Alle meine Freunde sind tot, sie liegen alle dort drüben! Ich hätte fliehen oder mich verstecken können, aber ich bin hergekommen, um Euch zu warnen ... und Ihr ..."
languages.original_text: "What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

traits.locale_text: "Was? Nein! Was für Ungereimtheiten? Ich bin der einzige Überlebende meines ganzen Trupps, versteht Ihr? Alle meine Freunde sind tot, sie liegen alle dort drüben! Ich hätte fliehen oder mich verstecken können, aber ich bin hergekommen, um Euch zu warnen ... und Ihr ..."

languages.text: « Quoi ? Non ! Qu'est-ce qui ne colle pas ? Je suis le seul survivant de toute mon escouade, vous comprenez ? Tous mes amis sont morts, ils sont étendus là-bas ! J'aurais pu fuir ou me cacher, mais j'ai choisi de venir jusqu'ici pour vous prévenir... et vous... »
languages.original_text: "What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Non ! Qu'est-ce qui ne colle pas ? Je suis le seul survivant de toute mon escouade, vous comprenez ? Tous mes amis sont morts, ils sont étendus là-bas ! J'aurais pu fuir ou me cacher, mais j'ai choisi de venir jusqu'ici pour vous prévenir... et vous... »

languages.text: “什么？不！哪里自相矛盾了？我是整个小队唯一的幸存者，你明白吗？我所有的朋友都死了，他们就躺在那里！我本可以逃跑，或者躲起来，但我却选择一路赶到这里，警告你这里很危险……可你却……”
languages.original_text: "What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

traits.locale_text: “什么？不！哪里自相矛盾了？我是整个小队唯一的幸存者，你明白吗？我所有的朋友都死了，他们就躺在那里！我本可以逃跑，或者躲起来，但我却选择一路赶到这里，警告你这里很危险……可你却……”

languages.text: 「え？違う！何が矛盾しているのですか？私は自分の部隊から唯一の生存者なんですよ、わかりますか？私の友達は、みんな死んでしまった。彼らは、あそこで横たわっているんだ！逃げたり隠れたりもできたけれど、私はここまで来てあなた方に警告しようと選んだんです…そしたら、あなたは…」
languages.original_text: "What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

traits.locale_text: 「え？違う！何が矛盾しているのですか？私は自分の部隊から唯一の生存者なんですよ、わかりますか？私の友達は、みんな死んでしまった。彼らは、あそこで横たわっているんだ！逃げたり隠れたりもできたけれど、私はここまで来てあなた方に警告しようと選んだんです…そしたら、あなたは…」

languages.text: «¿Qué...? ¡No! ¿Qué es lo que no cuadra? Soy el único superviviente de todo mi escuadrón, ¿lo entiende? Todos mis amigos están muertos, ¡están ahí tirados! Podría haber huido o esconderme, pero he elegido venir hasta aquí para advertirle... y usted...».
languages.original_text: "What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué...? ¡No! ¿Qué es lo que no cuadra? Soy el único superviviente de todo mi escuadrón, ¿lo entiende? Todos mis amigos están muertos, ¡están ahí tirados! Podría haber huido o esconderme, pero he elegido venir hasta aquí para advertirle... y usted...».

languages.text: "Ne? Hayır! Tutmayan ne var ki? Koca mangadan geriye bir ben kaldım, anlıyor musunuz? Tüm arkadaşlarım öldü, orada uzanmış yatıyorlar! Kaçabilirdim, saklanabilirdim ama bunca yolu tepip sizi uyarmaya geldim. Sizse..."
languages.original_text: "What? No! What doesn't add up? I'm the only survivor out of my entire squad, do you understand? All of my friends are dead — they're lying over there! I could have fled or hidden, but I chose to come all the way here to warn you... and you..."

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Hayır! Tutmayan ne var ki? Koca mangadan geriye bir ben kaldım, anlıyor musunuz? Tüm arkadaşlarım öldü, orada uzanmış yatıyorlar! Kaçabilirdim, saklanabilirdim ama bunca yolu tepip sizi uyarmaya geldim. Sizse..."
